sk.tsystems.forum.services

Class UserServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.tsystems.forum.services.UserServices

  • public class UserServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods needed for retrieving information about stored data of User class from the database.
    Author:
    martinharcarik

      Constructor and Description
      UserServices()

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserServices

        public UserServices()

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
        Adds the instance of User class into database. Instance of User is sent as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        user - is the instance of class User that needs to be stored in database.

      • registerUser

        public User registerUser(java.lang.String userName,
                         java.lang.String userPassword,
                         java.util.Date birthDate,
                         java.lang.String role,
                         java.lang.String status,
                         java.util.Date registeredOn)
        Adds the instance of the User class into database and returns it. Contains of two methods. First method adds the user into database, and second returns the user by property userName.
        Parameters:
        userName - represents the name of user
        userPassword - is the user's password
        birthDate - is the date of birth of user
        role - is either 'user' as a regular user with less privileges or 'admin' for user with all the privileges
        status - either 'confirmed' or 'pending', required to identify whether the user is able to log in or not.
        registeredOn - represents the date of registration
        Returns:
        the instance of User or null

      • approveUser

        public void approveUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Sets the property 'status' of instance of User class to 'confirmed'.
        Parameters:
        userName - represents value of 'userName' property, needed for getting the instance of User class to change it's 'status' property

      • isDBEmpty

        public boolean isDBEmpty()
        Checks whether the database contains any instances of the User class.
        Returns:
        true if the database contains 0 instances of the User class, false if it contains at least one instance of the User class

      • changePassword

        public void changePassword(java.lang.String userName,
                           java.lang.String newPassword)
        Sets the property 'userPassword' of instance of User class. Method first gets the instance of class User by method setPresentUser and then sets it's property 'userPassword' to value of parameter newPassword.
        Parameters:
        userName - is value of 'userName' property needed as parameter for method setPresentUser to get the instance of User class
        newPassword - represents the value of userPassword property to be set in the instance of User class

      • getPresentUser

        public User getPresentUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Gets the instance of User class. Method contains of getting id property of User class, then returning the found instance of User class.
        Parameters:
        userName - represents value of 'userName' property, needed to get 'userID' property of User class, passed as parameter of method getUserID
        Returns:
        the instance of User class or null, if there is no instance of User class with this 'userName' property stored in the database

      • getUserID

        public int getUserID(java.lang.String userName)
        Gets the integer value of the property 'userID' of the instance of the User class.
        Parameters:
        userName - represents value of 'userName' property of User class, used to select the needed instance of User class
        Returns:
        integer value of userID property of the instance of User class, or 0 if there is no instance of User class with specified 'userName' property stored in the database.

      • isPasswordCorrect

        public boolean isPasswordCorrect(java.lang.String userName,
                                 java.lang.String userPassword)
        Checks if the specified 'userPassword' property of the instance of User class has the same value than the value of stored 'userPassword' property for this instance of User class.
        Parameters:
        userName - is value of 'userName' property of the User class
        userPassword - is value of 'userPassword' property of the User class
        Returns:
        true if the specified combination of 'userName' and 'userPassword' properties of User class matches these properties of stored instance of the User class or false if specified properties do not match stored properties

      • getPendingUsers

        public java.util.List<User> getPendingUsers()
        Returns the list of instances of the User class with property 'status' set to value 'pending'.
        Returns:
        list of instances of User class

      • dropUser

        public void dropUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Removes the instance of the User class with specified property 'userName' from database
        Parameters:
        userName - is value of 'userName' property of the User class

      • isUserApproved

        public boolean isUserApproved(java.lang.String userName)
        Checks whether the instance of the User class with specified property 'userName' has it's property 'status' set to 'confirmed'
        Parameters:
        userName - is value of 'userName' property of the User class
        Returns:
        true if the property 'status' of specified instance of User class is set to 'confirmed', otherwise returns false

      • updateImage

        public void updateImage(User user,
                        byte[] profileImage)
        Sets the property 'profileImage' of specified instance of User class.
        Parameters:
        user - represents the instance of User class to set the 'profileImage' property of
        profileImage - is the value of 'profileImage' property of User class that is set to this instance of User class

      • getUsers

        public java.util.List<User> getUsers()
        Gets the list of instances of User class that have their 'status' property set to value 'confirmed'.
        Returns:
        list of confirmed users

      • toggleUserRole

        public void toggleUserRole(java.lang.String userName,
                           java.lang.String newRole)
        Sets the 'role' property of specified instance of the User class to value of the parameter 'newRole'. Method first gets the instance of the class User using the method setPresentUser, then sets it's property 'role'.
        Parameters:
        userName - is value of 'userName' property of the User class
        newRole - is value of 'role' property of the User class
